Title: A New Hope
Plot: The Warehouse team struggles with the horrible reality of the Warehouse's destruction and the tragic loss of Steve Jinks, Mrs. Frederic and H. G. Wells. With matters so desperate, Pete, Myka, Artie, Leena and Claudia must decide whether to knowingly use a dangerous artifact for their own personal gain ? at the risk of deadly consequences.
GuestStars: Brent Spiner, Anthony Michael Hall, Faran Tahir, Lester Holt, Ed Schultz, CCH Pounder, Jaime Murray, Lucy Filippone, Randy Butcher, Christian Laurin, Spencer Paul, Jeffrey R. Smith
